author: Christina Farr
title: Microsoft is launching a 'plasmabot' to encourage people who recovered from the virus to donate their plasma as a possible treatment
description: Microsoft's head of research, Peter Lee, believes that plasma from recovered Covid-19 patients could help sick people and protect protection to frontline workers while a vaccine is developed.
content:
Microsoft is working with a consortium of pharmaceutical companies to recruit people who have recovered from Covid-19 to donate their plasma, which could be used in treatments for the disease.
